div.p: This is the method the provider used to communicate. Examples include: Written, Telephoned, Verbal, Electronically Entered, Policy, Service Correction, Duplicate, etc. 'Code indicating the origin of the prescription.' - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 419-DJ, Data Dictionary 201104). Possible values include: Written; Telephone; Electronic; Facsimile; Pharmacy; Not Known.

publisher.value: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups
